title: Product Research & Listing VA for Fast-Growth Shopify Fashion Store
job_overview:
Dear Applicant,

We're looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Shopify VA to support our new USA-based fashion dropshipping brand. Our company is rapidly scaling, and this is a long-term opportunity for someone eager to grow with us.

Please start your application with the word strawberry so we know you’ve read the full post.

- Your Tasks Will Include:
Product Research

Using tools like WinningHunter and Meta Ads Library

Identifying trending product collections using clear KPIs we provide

Researching 5 potential winning collections per day

Product Listing

Importing products via Poky using AI-assisted tools

Translating, editing, and finalizing listings (titles, descriptions, variants)

Adding accurate size charts and checking image formatting

Organizing products into correct collections

- Requirements:
Shopify experience (must)

Experience with Poky, Facebook ads library, Winninghunter and/or Afterlib (must)

Basic understanding of product research (must)

Attention to detail — include the word avocado in your application

Good written English communication skills (must)

Experience with Trello, Google Sheets, Slack or similar (must)

Willingness to learn and follow SOPs exactly

Availability: 6-7 days a week, 4-5 hours per day

- What We Offer:
Detailed step-by-step SOPs for everything

Ongoing training & clear workflows

Long-term role with growth opportunities

Supportive team culture

- Compensation & Availability
Starting rate: €1.50/hour

Potential increase: Based on performance and reliability

You must be able to deliver 5 product launches per day, 7 days per week.
If you wish to take a day off (e.g., Sunday), you're expected to work ahead of schedule (e.g., complete 10 launches on Saturday).

Only apply if you fully agree with the rate and daily output requirement.
Applications requesting higher rates or unable to meet the schedule will not be considered.

If this sounds like a good fit and you're ready to be part of a fast-growing team — we’d love to hear from you.

Best regards,
Nass
